query: SELECT COLUMN_NAME, DATA_TYPE, COLUMN_TYPE FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.COLUMNS WHERE TABLE_NAME = 'sync_conflicts' ORDER BY ORDINAL_POSITION;
command: mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway03.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user GdNjKxkKZgeVtwE.root --database 5MUJ5aHkiAehb9iTzNdxTq --execute SELECT COLUMN_NAME, DATA_TYPE, COLUMN_TYPE FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.COLUMNS WHERE TABLE_NAME = 'sync_conflicts' ORDER BY ORDINAL_POSITION;
stdout:
COLUMN_NAME	DATA_TYPE	COLUMN_TYPE
id	int	int(11)
sync_job_id	int	int(11)
account_id	int	int(11)
user_id	int	int(11)
entity_type	enum	enum('campaign','ad_group','keyword','product_target')
entity_id	varchar	varchar(64)
entity_name	varchar	varchar(500)
conflict_type	enum	enum('data_mismatch','missing_local','missing_remote','status_conflict')
local_data	json	json
remote_data	json	json
conflict_fields	json	json
suggested_resolution	enum	enum('use_local','use_remote','merge','manual')
resolution_status	enum	enum('pending','resolved','ignored')
resolved_at	timestamp	timestamp
resolved_by	int	int(11)
resolution_notes	text	text
created_at	timestamp	timestamp
